Title: SEC (Antimicrobial & Antiviral)
FullText: the firm presented their proposal for gepotidacin trial. after detailed deliberation, the committee recommended the conduct of the clinical trial.

Title: SEC (Oncology)
FullText: m/s cipla presented their proposal for a biosimilar. the committee recommended approval for marketing authorization.

Title: SEC (Cardiology)
FullText: after review, the committee deferred the trial proposal for further clarification regarding telmisartan combination.
